name: The Saylor Foundation
description: The Saylor Foundation is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization committed to the development and structuring of free, online educational materials. Michael Saylor, CEO of leading business intelligence company MicroStrategy, Inc., established The Constitution Foundation (currently D.B.A. The Saylor Foundation) in 1999. He serves as the Foundation’s sole trustee. He launched the Free Education Initiative in 2008.
